THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON
10.01.2019, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING:

ee
Crl.MC.No. 218 of 2019 2 2O1MKER/T323
ORDER

Petition filed under Section 482 Cr.P.C.

2. Petitioner is the accused in Crime
No.1067 of 2017 of Hosdurg Police Station,
Kasaragod. He is alleged to have committed the
offences under Sections 420 and 465 Â£42=IPC.
Respondents 2 and 3 are the victims. It is
submitted that the matter has been settled and
the proceedings in the trial court may be
quashed.

3. Heard the learned counsel for the
petitioner and respondents 2 and 3 and the
learned Public Prosecutor.

4. TI have perused the affidavits filed by
respondents 2 and 3, who have entered
appearance through counsel. T am satisfied
that the matter has been settled and no public
interest is involved in this case. There is no
impediment for granting the prayer of the
petitioner.

meee
Crl.MC.No. 218 of 2019 3 2019/KERI1323
In the result, this Crl.M.C. is allowed.

The proceedings in Crime No.1067 of 2017 of
Hosdurg Police Station, Kasaragod are quashed.
If any material objects have been produced in
this case, the trial court may pass appropriate
orders for their disposal.

Sd/-

K. ABRAHAM MATHEW

JUDGE
